text: tatha (he nabee!) ham bhej chuke hain bahut-se rasoolon ko aapase poorv, jinamen se kuchh ka varnan ham aapase kar chuke hain tatha kuchh ka varnan aapase nahin kiya hai tatha kisee rasool ke (vash)[1] mein ye nahin tha ki vah koee aayat (chamatkaar) le aaye, parantu allaah kee anumati se. phir jab aa jaayega allaah ka aadesh, to nirnay kar diya jaayega saty ke saath aur kshati mein pad jaayenge vahaan, kshoothe log
